hero.subtitle: Capture voice responses from your surveys and forms. Transcribe, analyze and export insights in real time â€” powered by AI.

features.sectionTitle: Everything you need to capture voice insights
features.sectionSubtitle: From real-time transcription to powerful analytics, Voice Capture gives your surveys a voice.

realtime.title: Real-Time Transcription
realtime.description: Transcribe voice responses instantly as respondents speak. No waiting, no delays.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Support for 9+ languages out of the box. Reach respondents in their native language.

integration.title: Easy Integration
integration.description: Add voice capture to Alchemer and other platforms with a simple code snippet.

export.title: Flexible Export
export.description: Export transcriptions as CSV, Excel, or access them via API. Your data, your way.

analytics.title: AI-Powered Analytics
analytics.description: Get automatic sentiment analysis, keyword extraction, and response summaries.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: SOC2-ready infrastructure with encryption at rest and in transit. GDPR compliant.

pricing.sectionSubtitle: Start free, scale as you grow. No hidden fees.

cta.title: Ready to give your surveys a voice?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of research teams already using Voice Capture to collect richer, more authentic feedback.
